question_text: What letter do you make holding your left index finger straight, the other fingers curled into your palm, and making semi-circle with your right thumb and index finger?
Which letter do you make by forming a fist, with the index and middle fingers extended and touching each other together on your other palm?
Which letter is signed by making a fist with the index finger extended touching the opposing thumb?
Which letter is made by holding two fingers apart on the palm while curling the other fingers in?
Which letter is made by holding both hands with their plams open and fingers together
Which letter is formed by shaping your hand into a fist and your index finger and thumb into semi-circle?
What letter do you make by shaping your both hands into a fist, with your right fist above the left?
Which letter is formed by putting the tips of all your fingers so they rest on your left palm then swiping down?
Which letter is signed by touching the tip of your index finger with your opposing index finger?
Which letter is made by forming a fist, with the index and middle fingers extended, with both hands and then crossing the fingers?
Which letter is signed by touching the tip of your middle finger with your opposing index finger?
Which letter is signed by extending the index finger and drawing a shape on the palm, while the other fingers remain folded in?
